mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.balance_no AS "balanceNo", a.weight_no AS "weightNo", a.amount AS "amount", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM c_balance_sale a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} ${dataScope}
AND a.balance_no LIKE '%'||#{balanceNo}||'%' '%'+#{balanceNo}+'%' concat('%',#{balanceNo},'%')
AND a.weight_no LIKE '%'||#{weightNo}||'%' '%'+#{weightNo}+'%' concat('%',#{weightNo},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO c_balance_sale( id, balance_no, weight_no, amount, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{balanceNo}, #{weightNo}, #{amount}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE c_balance_sale SET balance_no = #{balanceNo}, weight_no = #{weightNo}, amount = #{amount}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
